name: Pyramid Pillar Candle
description:
6 Inches Tall. 4" wide on the bottom sides and 3" tapering to the top.

This is a pyramid-shaped pillar candle that looks beautiful in white as shown, but can be made custom in any color(s) you would like. Please indicate color using the pull-down menu or select "other" at checkout and list multiple up to three colors. More colors allowed by custom request: info@mdesignboutique.com 

Please request the fragrance you would like by writing it in at checkout. If you need inspiration for fragrance please visit http://mdesignboutique.wordpress.com/about/candle-fragrances/ -- and if you don't see what you want please email info@mdesignboutique.com.

name: Tapered Oval Pillar Candle
description:
6.75 Inches Tall. 3.75" at widest point on the bottom and 2.5" at widest point on the top.

This is a tapered oval pillar candle that looks beautiful in white as shown, but can be made custom in any color(s) you would like. Please indicate color using the pull-down menu - select "other" and list up to three colors. More colors allowed by custom request: info@mdesignboutique.com 

Please request the fragrance you would like by writing it in at checkout. If you need inspiration for fragrance please visit http://mdesignboutique.wordpress.com/about/candle-fragrances/ -- and if you don't see what you want please email info@mdesignboutique.com.

name: Crescent Moon Pillar Candle You Select Color or Colors and Fragrance
description:
This listing is for a 3" Tall by 5" at widest point Crescent Moon Pillar Candle.

Any color, any fragrance. If you want more than one color, please make a note at checkout or contact me for a custom listing.

Wax is paraffin with natural additives to create the "mottling" effect, or clouds, crackling and milky surface textures. Each candle will be different with unique surface effects. Photos are representative of the candle in each order, but every candle result is different.

Wicks are 100% Cotton and Lead-free.

My candles are not for those of you looking for flawless manufactured looking candles.

Note that I accept custom requests for color, fragrance, size and shape. Please convo me for custom requests.

name: Six Point Star Pillar Candle Any Color Any Fragrance
description:
8.5 Inches Tall. 4" at widest point on the bottom and 3" at widest point on the top.

This is a tapered six-pointed star pillar candle that looks beautiful in white as shown, but can be made custom in any color(s) you would like. Please indicate color using the pull-down menu or select "other" at checkout and list multiple up to three colors. More colors allowed by custom request: info@mdesignboutique.com 

Please request the fragrance you would like by writing it in at checkout. If you need inspiration for fragrance please visit http://mdesignboutique.wordpress.com/about/candle-fragrances/ -- and if you don't see what you want please email info@mdesignboutique.com. Fragrance-free is also available.

name: Scalloped Twist Pillar Candle
description:
6. Inches Tall. 2.75" at widest point.

This is a scalloped round pillar candle with a slight twist that looks beautiful in white as shown, but can be made custom in any color(s) you would like. Please indicate color using the pull-down menu - select "other" and list up to three colors. More colors allowed by custom request: info@mdesignboutique.com 

Please request the fragrance you would like by writing it in at checkout. If you need inspiration for fragrance please visit http://mdesignboutique.wordpress.com/about/candle-fragrances/ -- and if you don't see what you want please email info@mdesignboutique.com.

name: Reusable Stemless Wine Glass Candle
description:
Beautiful Soy Wax in a reusable stemless wine glass. Any fragrance request will be match to the best of my ability!

Use the pull-down menu to select from seasonal and most-popular fragrances, or select "custom" and note at check out if you'd like a different fragrance.

Clean-burning soy wax burns 30% longer than paraffin. Wicks are 100% Cotton braid, designed to burn clean with a medium flame. Soy wax features a resting fragrance throw, meaning, it will smell good even when not being burned!

Soy is a natural wax, which can easily be cleaned off the surface of the glass when the wick is extinguished. Wash the remnant wax out with mild soap and water and safely re-use the glass for wine, juice or anything else! A votive candle will fit nicely in the glass if you prefer to continue its use as a candle container.

name: MDB Signature Soy Votive Cups
description:
This listing is for two votive cups. 

Select fragrance from the pull-down menu.

MDB uses only the finest quality soy wax for beauty, long burn, fragrance quality and sustainable resourcing. Wicks are braided cotton to produce optimum top curl, which makes these burn evenly, with a medium flame. 

Fragrances available represent MDB owner Melissa Machowski's very favorite custom and new blends at any given time. These blends are signature to M Design Boutique.

Fragrances must pass a bevy of burn tests, scent throw both burning and at rest, true-to-nature scent, and enhanced impact on good, calm, happy or festive moods. 

If you would like a fragrance that you do not see on the list here, please contact info@mdesignboutique.com to request your favorite fragrances. 

Custom quantities are available by request. Please contact info@mdesignboutique.com to request larger quantities.

If you are interested in having these made with a one-color line art logo or message, please contact info@mdesignboutique.com to request pricing information. Minimum order is 36 for custom design one-color artwork/logo/message.

name: M Design Boutique Hoody Sweatshirt
description:
Currently available in M, L, XL. If you would like a different size, please contact me at info@mdesignboutique.com and I will add your size to the next order.

Black hooded sweatshirt with plain front and the lovely Bayberry logo and URL from M Design Boutique. 

Unisex design, men's sizes listed here. 

Custom colors and sizes will be noted if you contact me with requests.

name: Elliptical Pillar Candle As Shown
description:
READY TO SHIP - The candle in the photograph is the exact candle you will receive. This and other candles in the "Ready to ship" category were made as samples to display shape, size and overall details of custom candles.

This candle fragrance is Jasmine and Beach Daisy, which are light and pretty florals with a hint of Spice Market. Lovely for any season.

Use code "READY2SHIP" to get 20% off on this candle when you check out. 

From one angle the candle has a wide profile and from the other, it is elliptical and narrow. The lines are modern and this is an unexpected shape for a candle.

Dimensions are 6" Tall by 6" Wide by up to 2" at the widest point of the ellipse.

name: Giant Candle - Six Inches Diameter by Fifteen Inches Tall
description:
This is an oversized pillar candle. The dimensions are 6" x 15". It weighs over 13 lbs and has three wicks.

Hundreds of hours of burning time.
Any color. Specify at checkout or contact me for a custom listing.
Any fragrance. Specify at checkout or contact me for a custom listing.

I can do multiple colors and fragrances, and am happy to go with minimal or lots of specification. I can color match fabric samples or other materials. 

Contact info@mdesignboutique.com for full shipping quote, or you will be billed for the difference in my base shipping price and the price it costs to ship to you.

Please contact me for international shipping info.

I have several giant candle molds in diameters up to 12 inches, and am happy to have new molds made for increased sizes. 

Allow one month turn-around time for custom molded giant candles. If you need it quick, check with me first before you order info@mdesignboutique.com.

name: Soy Blend Wedding Cake Votive Candle
description:
This beautifully detailed wedding cake makes an awesome cake topper for bridal or couples showers, weddings or even birthdays.

I can make it in any solid color, but soy wax makes the colors more pastel, creamy and muted. 

Default fragrance is Buttercream, but I can do other fragrances on request.

Quantity discount for orders of 20 or more. Please contact me for a quote at info@mdesignboutique.com

International shipping quote on request.

name: White Beeswax Hand-dipped Taper Candles 5-9 Inches Tall
description:
Beautiful hand-dipped taper candles. Any size available up to 9 inches.

This listing is for one pair of 5 inch tapers, or select taller from the pull-down window.

Made from 100% White Beeswax. Cotton Braided Wicks.

name: Venus Of Willendorf Fertility Goddess Candle
description:
Any colors, fragrance of fertility herbs.

Ancient symbol of fertility. She illuminates with fertile energy.

name: Adventures In Marriage Wedding Gift Custom Label Option
description:
This listing is for 20 Bottles with standard label customized with names. For further customization or larger quantities, please read on.

This listing describes the "Adventures In Marriage" Collecting Jars with Customizable Labels.

Please read the whole listing before contacting me for your custom listing!

This is a cute idea for kicking off a marriage! Great for destination weddings too. You can even collect sand for their first bottle and package it right at the destination for them!

The bride and groom can start with their honeymoon collecting sand or whatever other little goodies they find along their travels. Soil from each home they live in...the ideas are endless! This is a beautiful keepsake that will evolve with the marriage and mark the travels and adventures the couple shares throughout their long happy lives together.

This comes with:
*** Customized labels on bottles with corks (as shown in photo)
*** Travel Kit for collecting sand, coffee, herbs, etc: This is so the bride and groom don't have to carry bottles when they travel -
- Same number of small baggies as bottles
- Sharpie for labeling baggies and bottles
*** Spice Funnel - for getting stuff into the bottles
*** Instructions for use
*** I will save the custom label design and on the instruction sheet, the couple will be able to contact me to order more bottles if they need them...or you can come back and order more for them on their anniversaries if you know they're running low!

Comes packaged ready for you to give!

Request gift wrap with your custom listing if you want your order shipped straight to the newlyweds.

Minimum order is 20 Bottles

20 Bottles = $3.00 per bottle + Shipping
Additional batches of 20 Bottles are $2.00 per bottle

Example Prices:
20 Bottles with Customized Stock Label = $60 + Shipping
20 Bottles with Fully Customized Label (see below) = $75 + shipping

40 Bottles with Customized Stock Label = $100 + Shipping
40 Bottles with Fully Customized Label (see below) = 115 + shipping

Stock Labels can be customized at no extra charge with the bride and groom's name and one line of text such as "Our Adventures in Marriage"

IF YOU ARE A RETURN CUSTOMER TO M DESIGN BOUTIQUE PLEASE NOTE THAT I WILL WAIVE YOUR CUSTOM DESIGN FEE!

Current Stock Label is shown in the photos.

Custom Labels available for a flat rate of $15

Provide your own design or I will design based on your specifications.

Design Service Includes:
- Text in a variety of font styles.
- Photo or Illustration

name: Bride and Bridal Party Survival Kit Set
description:
This is a beautiful way for the Maid of Honor or Mother of the Bride to honor the ladies with a custom gift. 

Comes with one Bridal Survival Kit and as many Bridesmaid  Survival Kits as needed (Use pull-down menu). If you have more than 5 Bridesmaids please email info@mdesignboutique.com for a custom listing. Shipping will also be custom for more than 5 Bridesmaids.

Add a custom label set for your kits! If you would like a custom label for your kits, please contact me info@mdesignboutique.com and I will create a custom listing. Add $15 for custom label set, which includes design and labels for bridal kit and up to 20 Bridesmaids/Junior Bridesmaids.

If this is for a bridal shower, please be sure to consider matching Soy Travel Candle Favors and a matching "Adventures In Marriage" gift for the bride-to-be. I will create your custom shower/event suite to your liking, and can also add other custom labeled items for your shower decor!

name: Wedding/Event Favor Soy Travel Candles
description:
Perfect for bridal showers, baby showers, wedding favors or any other event or party favors.

Minimum order is 20 Candles

20 - 49 Candles = $3.50 per candle + Shipping
50 - 99 Candles = $3.25 per candle + Shipping
100 - 149 Candles = $2.75 per candle + Shipping
150 or more Candles = $2.50 + Shipping

Images in this listing are of candles created for previous events using customer design specs. Your candles will have your design customized for your event.

Provide your own design or I will design based on your specifications.

Design Service Includes:
- A few lines of text in a variety of font styles.
- Photo or Illustration

Please request your favorite fragrance or fragrances. Chances are good that I can provide anything you request!

Wax is soy, which is a milky creamy clean-burning wax that burns 30% longer than paraffin.

Wicks are 100% Cotton, Lead-free.

Convo me with your requests and I will make a custom listing for the corresponding number of guests, design details, fragrance and wax color preference choices.

Be creative! I am a graphic designer, which means I can make a great label for your travel candles! If you provide artwork, please be sure that it is not copyright protected, or that you have permission to use the image, photo or artwork.

name: Twisted Beeswax 6 Inch Hand-dipped Taper Candles
description:
This listing is for one connected, hand-dipped " set of twoTwisted candles suitable for hanging as decor or burning safely on a candle-safe surface.

Contact me for larger quantities to guarantee best shipping price.

These are high quality pure natural beeswax candles (no blends!) with braided cotton wick.

Natural wax burns cleaner and slower than other types of wax because it burns at a higher temperature.

The wicks have been selected to burn clean and efficiently with a slight top curl to burn evenly throughout to the edge of the wax.

The fragrance of all "Pioneer Brasa" is from the natural fragrance of the wax, which is a light floral honey fragrance that is so light and natural it works for any season.

The techniques I use come from Scandinavian traditions and American Old West Pioneer techniques,

Large orders will take up to one month to process, but please contact me for specific information and estimated delivery dates.

name: Beeswax Bamboo Pillar Candle
description:
Beautiful, realistically detailed molded bamboo pillar candle.

Default color is a range of natural color of beeswax similar to the photo.

100% Pure Beeswax. Also available in white beeswax.

About 4" diameter and just under 7" tall.

name: Beeswax Pinecone Candle (Single)
description:
This listing is two beeswax pinecone candles.

Contact me for larger quantities to guarantee best shipping price.

These are high quality pure natural beeswax candles (no blends!) with braided cotton wick.

Natural wax burns cleaner and slower than other types of wax because it burns at a higher temperature.

The wicks have been selected to burn clean and efficiently with a slight top curl to burn evenly throughout to the edge of the wax.

The fragrance is from the natural fragrance of the wax, which is a light floral honey fragrance that is so light and natural it works for any season. You may also request a light trace of pine cone fragrance of blue spruce or frasier fir.

name: Beeswax Pinecone Candle Set of Two
description:

description:

Contact me for larger quantities to guarantee best shipping price.

These are high quality pure natural wax blend candles with braided cotton wick.

Natural wax burns cleaner and slower than other types of wax because it burns at a higher temperature.

Select fragrance from pull-down menu or request custom fragrance.

name: Soy Blend Bamboo Pillar
description:
Beautiful, realistic bamboo candle.

Default color is a range of natural colors similar to the photo.

Default fragrance is Himalayan Bamboo.

Other colors and fragrances are available upon request.

About 4" diameter and just under 7" tall.

name: Two Sand Candles
description:
Pretty soy wax poured directly into small sand pits, cooled, and removed to reveal fascinating texture and surface. These are ideal for beach weddings, Summer parties or sea-themed decor.

You will want to set them on a small tray or some kind of holder so that the sand and wax don't damage surfaces. They would look adorable in a plate or tray filled with sand, set in a group, amongst seashells, etc.

These are approximately the same size as a votive in terms of wax volume, but will burn differently due to the unusual shapes.

Bulk discount applies to orders of 20 or more. Please contact me for a full quote for custom candles.

name: Twelve Skinny Dipped Birthday or Menorah Candles White with ANY COLOR
description:
Please select dip color. If you want multiple colors, feel free to contact me for a custom listing or specify at checkout.

This listing is for twelve white and any other color taper candles. Sets of 12.

name: Wax Luminaria Inspired by Artist and Friend Adam Adamowicz
description:
This listing if for one set of two candles .

The shell is wax in any color under the sun, or white. I add some an additive that makes it very translucent. 

The inside wax is white creamy soy, which burns clean and 30% longer than paraffin. 

As the flame burns, the shell is lit, thus creating a luminaria! As the heat hits the shell, it morphs into oddly organic shapes and looks very ethereal. So magical.

These candles are made in loving memory of my friend Adam Adamowicz (google him...you'll be amazed!), who's passing inspired my first versions of these. Adam's artwork, personality and spirit inspire me to be good, to do good, and to enjoy life and art to the fullest.

name: Round Pillar Candle In Any Color and Fragrance Combo
description:
Beautiful pillar candle in any height from 4"-12" Tall.

Wax is paraffin with natural additives to create the "mottling" effect, or clouds, crackling and milky surface textures. Each candle will be different with unique surface effects. Photos are representative of the candle in each order, but every candle result is different.

Wicks are 100% Cotton and Lead-free.

My candles are not for those of you looking for flawless manufactured looking candles.

I accept custom requests for color, fragrance, size and shape. Please convo me for custom requests.

name: Yin Yang Candle Set
description:
This is one large candle that is actually two candles that fit together. Each side has its own wick and can stand freely.

Together, the diameter of the candle is 3.5 inches. The photo shows a twelve inch tall set.

This listing is for a twelve inch tall set. Please specify your color preferences at checkout, and request up to 5 fragrances. I will respond with my options according to your requests.

This is available in other sizes starting at five inches tall. $5 per inch tall. So for instance, a 5 inch candle set would be $25. Contact me for custom heights. I will create a custom listing for you with the appropriate details.

name: Crystal Surface Square Pillar Candle
description:
Please contact me for custom colors, shapes and sizes.

This listing is for one 9 inch tall square pillar candle. Default color is Ice Blue and fragrance is "Wonderland". Custom color/fragrance by request.

The surface effect of this candle is crystalline and sparkles as light hits it. The crystal appearance is actually textured from cooling techniques and additives used in the wax. Colors are muted due to the formation of white crystals throughout the candle. This is an enchanting, magical effect.

name: Marble-Embedded Pillar Candle
description:
This candle has a heap of marbles embedded in the outer layer to reveal interesting light reflections and refractions when the candle is lit, and as it burns down.

The candle is 4" diameter and about 8" Tall. The bottom and top inch have no marbles. This candle should be burned in a large bowl or hurricane container to catch marbles and dripping wax that will be a bit unpredictable due to the embeds.

Request any colors and fragrances! The one in the photo is Black Raspberry, Raspberry Truffle and Chocolate Covered Cherries blended into the berry colored wax layers.

name: Round Pillar Candles Four Inches Tall Any Color Any Fragrance 4 to 12 inches Tall
description:
This listing is for a Scented Pillar Candle in your custom color and fragrance.

Minimum Height = 4 inches

$4 per inch.

Contact me with your fragrance and color at checkout or before or after purchasing.

Shipping listed is for all heights.

I can do stripes as well in multiple or same fragrance.

Wax is paraffin with natural additives to create the "mottling" effect, or clouds, crackling and milky surface textures. Each candle will be different with unique surface effects. Photos are representative of the candle in each order, but every candle result is different.

Wicks are 100% Cotton and Lead-free.

My candles are not for those of you looking for flawless manufactured looking candles.

Note that I accept custom requests for color, fragrance, size and shape. Please convo me for custom requests.

name: Six Inch Pillar Candle
description:
Six Inches Tall. 

If you'd like a different height up to 12" please contact me for a custom listing. Minimum 4". $4 per inch round as shown in photo. Other shapes available = square, octagon, large three wick round, rectangle.

If you would like another color, please select "Other" and specify color at checkout.

Fragrance is a lovely Holly & Ivy fragrance. If you would like another fragrance, please contact me for a custom listing. This fragrance is a beautiful Winter fragrance, and would be perfect to light at a holiday table or for when guests visit. Would be lovely in a centerpiece.

name: Mimosa Candles in Champagne Flutes Set of Two
description:
These beautiful Glass Champagne Flutes contain hand-poured candles. When the candle is done burning, simply remove any residual wax, wash thoroughly and use the champagne flute for real champagne!

Recommended Fragrances are "Strawberries & Champagne" or "Mimosa" but can be made in any fragrance. Contact info@mdesignboutique.com for your custom requests.

Mimosa fragrance is orange essential oil with sugar champagne.

This listing is for two Mimosa Champagne Flute Candles.

Perfect for Brunches, Easter, Girls Nights, New Years Eve, Valentine's Day, Weddings, Graduations, Engagement Parties and any other occasion where mimosas are served.

Wax is a lightly shaded parafin with a mottling effect that mimics champagne bubbles. Note that it is translucent and glows when lit (see photo).



*They burn down to about 1/3 full, where the wick ends. This is so that the flame will not crack the champagne flute.

name: Soy Cauldron Full Moon Luxe Prayer Candle
description:
This candle can come in any fragrance, but the default is "Full Moon Luxe" which is a blend of Jasmine, Rosemary and Ylang Ylang. Burn this candle to celebrate all forms of love, whether you are seeking or celebrating love in your life.

Comes in a real cast iron Lodge Logic mini cauldron and can be used later for alters, decor, spices and so on. The handle is only attached by wax, so it can be removed. Handle features a rustic heart.

Wax is soy with cotton wick. Clean and long-burning.

name: Soy Canning Jar Candle With Primitive Stars Lid Cutouts
description:
Cute short canning jar with primitive cutout stars on the lid. Any fragrance please specify at check-out.

Wax is soy with cotton wick. Clean and long-burning.

Ships with insurance and delivery confirmation.

name: Cotton Spa Face Cloth
description:
Pretty Organic Cotton Spa Face Cloth

This is a hand-knit standard size wash cloth. It is super soft and perfect for washing face and body. Great for travel or home! The face cloths are incredibly soft and perfect for a refreshing wash at the sink or in the shower. Easy to use and totally washable. 

See currently available colors in pull-down menu.

3 oz. hand-poured bars of Goats Milk Soap in any fragrance can also be added to your order for an additional $4. Please convo to request a custom listing.

name: Soap & Certified Organic Cotton Spa Leaf Cloth GIft Set
description:
Choose from any of the soaps listed in pull down menu.

This comes as shown in the photo, with the soap wrapped in the leaf spa cloth (perfect for washing up at the sink) and tied with raffia.

Pretty Organic Cotton Spa Face Cloth

The soap is vegan, cold process soaps using the finest ingredients available.

The face cloths are incredibly soft and perfect for a refreshing wash at the sink or in the shower. Easy to use and totally washable.

name: Spa Cloth & CP Soap Set
description:
This is a beautiful, full size face cloth and bath bar of gentle vegan soap, your choice of fragrance. They come packaged together with pretty raffia in either blue, green or red. A lovely gift or a way to treat yourself!

Pretty Organic Cotton Spa Face Cloth with your choice of Cold Process Soap. Use the pull-down menu to select a fragrance for your bar of soap. 

This is a hand-knit standard size wash cloth. It is super soft and perfect for washing face and body. Great for travel or home! The face cloths are incredibly soft and perfect for a refreshing wash at the sink or in the shower. Easy to use and totally washable.

The cotton is "Grown, spun and dyed in accordance with the Global Organic Textile Standard, Certified by Institute for Marketecology Switzerland".

The color is Almond, a light shade that will look pretty where ever they are!

name: Raw African Shea Butter and Hemp Soap or Shampoo Bar
description:
This extremely unusual combination of Raw African Shea Butter Soap suspended in a gentle hemp-based soap makes an awesome skin cleanser and is gentle enough to use as a shampoo.

If you have blemishes or spots, or any kind of troubled skin, you will benefit from Raw African Shea Soap. The gentle foaming lather will wash away impurities and leave even combination skin even. Not dry, not oily, just clean!

The combination of shea soap and hemp soap makes a gentle, healing lather for hair as well. This can be used as a daily shampoo, or alternated in with your normal hair care routine.

Bars are cut to fit easily in the hand for use at the sink or in the shower. Not full-size bath bars, but larger than the most generous guest soap. 

You will love this soap. Not only is it extremely healing with a lovely light botanical fragrance (perfect for men or women), but it is a gorgeous bar of soap. Pretty in a nature-inspired bathroom.

name: Coffee & Oats Huge Bath Bar
description:
Made with olive oil, coconut oil, vitamin E, jojoba, sweet almond oil and oats. Moisturizing, exfoliating, and great for sensitive skin.

This giant bar of cold process soap contains real chopped oats, fresh brewed coffee and finely ground coffee for a light, moisturizing lather.

There are no additional colorants, and the fragrance is entirely from the ingredients listed above and Dark Chocolate fragrance oil.

For international shipping quotes, please contact me!

name: Cadillac Mechanic Grit Loofah Soap
description:
Cadillac Mechanic Soap, also great for Gardeners and cooks! 

This is made with Irish Breakfast Tea, Cocoa Butter, and Loofah Powder. 

Fragrance is Ylang Ylang and Sandalwood, and it is tea speckled with swirled black oxide colorant. 

This is awesome for getting super grimy skin clean. Leaves skin soft and moisturized. 

Gorgeous looking and masculine for the tough guys in the crowd.

name: Double-Wide Cold Process Maple Praline Oatmeal Soap
description:
Made with olive oil, coconut oil, vitamin E, jojoba, sweet almond oil and oats. Moisturizing, soothing, and great for dry skin. Wrapped in parchment, tied with bakers twine. Pretty enough to give!

This giant 6 oz bar of soap contains real chopped oats for a light, moisturizing lather.

There are no additional colorants, and the fragrance is entirely from the ingredients listed above.

For international shipping quotes, please contact me!

name: Ten Bar Goat Milk Soap Loaf - Whole or Uncut
description:
Ten Bars Custom Goat Milk Soap Loaf.

You tell me what fragrances and colors you want and I will make and send you a custom loaf of soap! This is a cute idea for slumber parties, spa parties, bridal showers and so on!

I can add rose hips, rose petals, lavender buds, calendula petals, apricot seeds, blueberry seeds, chamomile, oats, coffee, black or herbal tea...get creative!

Shown in Photo: Goat Milk Soap with Lavender Essential Oil & Lavender Buds. 

Custom made loaf with 10 Full Bath Bars.

name: Hand-dipped Incense Sticks
description:
Twenty hand-dipped incense sticks. My fragrances are all chosen and tested for burn-rate and fragrance quality. Fragrances are selected for compatibility with light smoke fragrance. All fragrances are signature small-batch blends created by and for M Design Boutique!

Current Fragrance Choices:

Hearth: A calm blend of Sandalwood, Nag Champa and a hint of Vanilla

More fragrances to come.

name: Hand-dipped Incense - You Select Fragrance
description:
This lovely, comforting blends elements of earth, spice and breeze will delight your home.

Ten sticks of hand-dipped incense per bunch.

Select one fragrance, or all three. Ten each.

name: Aromatherapy Reed Diffuser Essential Oil Kit (Mini)
description:
This beautiful kit comes with a cut glass jar and wood diffuser sticks. Jar is filled with Essential Oil Diffuser Solution hand-mixed in small batches.

Please use the pull-down menu to see the current selection of available fragrances. More selections will be added each month.

This kit may be placed in any room for a lovely clean aroma. Depending on your Essential Oil selection, it may act as a disinfectant for the air. This makes a lovely, functional decoration.

name: All Natural Old Fashioned Laundry Powder Detergent
description:
This comes unscented or with light pure essential oil fragrance (use pull down menu for fragrance selection.

Eight ounces of all-natural laundry detergent in powder form. If you prefer liquid, you may add one or two spoonfuls to hot water to dissolve prior to adding to your washer.

This is a very gentle detergent made for those with sensitive skin. 

Comes in a beautiful apothecary container with a wood scoop.

Use one scoop for smaller loads, and two scoops for either larger or more soiled loads. This is enough detergent for 24 larger/more soiled loads or around 40 smaller loads.

name: Espresso Cane Sugar Scrub and Dark Chocolate Coffee Butter Cream Set
description:
One of each lovely coffee-inspired and infused treatments. 

Individually purchased these would cost $20. Purchased as a set in this listing you save $3!

The Espresso Scrub:
This moisturizing sugar scrub will exfoliate your skin as it softens rough dry patches.

Made with brown sugar, espresso and pure cane sugar (infused with real espresso), this scrub is a unique, fragrant treat!


The Coffee Butter Cream:
Coffee butter is similar to mango butter or Shea butter, but derived from coffee.

This is a four ounce container that will last and last. Be sure to check out the other bath and body products containing coffee and espresso if you're looking for a great gift set. I welcome custom gift orders, and am happy to package things together ready to give.

This buttery cream has a divine note of coffee fragrance in from the coffee butter element of this healing recipe. You'll experience long lasting effects from this blend containing sunflower oil, beeswax and olive oil.

This can be applied to feet, elbows, or other extremely dry skin patches...but is also a daily skin moisturizer for dry Winter skin or for anyone who spends time outdoors.

Not something you'll be finding all over the place, this is a special recipe unique to M Design Boutique!

name: Espresso Cane Sugar Scrub
description:
This moisturizing sugar scrub will exfoliate your skin as it softens rough dry patches. 

Made with brown sugar, espresso and pure cane sugar (infused with real espresso), this scrub is a unique, fragrant treat!

name: Dark Chocolate Coffee Butter Cream
description:
Looking for something totally decadent? This is it.

Coffee butter is similar to mango butter or Shea butter, but derived from coffee. 

This is a four ounce container that will last and last. Be sure to check out the other bath and body products containing coffee and espresso if you're looking for a great gift set. I welcome custom gift orders, and am happy to package things together ready to give.

This buttery cream has a divine note of coffee fragrance in from the coffee butter element of this healing recipe. You'll experience long lasting effects from this blend containing sunflower oil, beeswax and olive oil.

This can be applied to feet, elbows, or other extremely dry skin patches...but is also a daily skin moisturizer for dry Winter skin or for anyone who spends time outdoors. 

Not something you'll be finding all over the place, this is a special recipe unique to M Design Boutique!

name: Luxury Lip Balm
description:
This luxury lip balm is made with shea and cocoa butters. Perfect for riding the range, on those hot Summer days or in the bitter cold of Winter.

Sooth and protect your lovely lips with Vanilla Bean or Tropical Punch varieties.

Specify which flavor you'd like at checkout!

name: Aromatherapy Reed Diffuser Essential Oil Kit
description:
This beautiful kit comes with a cube glass jar and white diffuser branches. Jar is filled with Essential Oil Diffuser Solution hand-mixed in small batches. 

Please use the pull-down menu to see the current selection of available fragrances. More selections will be added each month.

This kit may be placed in any room for a lovely clean aroma. Depending on your Essential Oil selection, it may act as a disinfectant for the air. This makes a lovely, functional decoration.

name: Apple Pie Candle Looks Like A Real Mini Pie
description:
Realistic looking Berry Pie Candle in Spiced Apple and Pie Crust fragrance. Wax Crust and Apples in spiced gel wax filling. This looks so cute you won't want to burn it...but smells so good you won't want to resist! Great for Fall and Holiday decor! This is great for any season.

Ships with insurance and delivery confirmation.

Please request your favorite fruits or other food candle ideas!

These are a great decoration for the table or plate. Incredibly realistic so please do warn your guests and children these are not to be eaten!

name: Fruit Salad Candle in Half Orange Peel Wax Cup
description:
Colorful mixed wax berries, melon balls and purple and green grapes in a bright and cheerful wax half-orange peel cup. Fragrance default is mixed wild berries with mango-papaya.

Comes packaged in a cute clear clam shell container similar to those used for individual cupcakes. This could easily be sent home with guests as a beautiful favor gift.

Ships with insurance and delivery confirmation.

Please request your favorite fruits or other food candle ideas!

These are a great brunch decoration for the table or plate. Incredibly realistic so please do warn your guests and children these are not to be eaten!

name: Berry Pie Candle
description:
Realistic looking Berry Pie Candle in Wild Berry fragrance. Wax Crust and Black Berries in spiced gel wax filling. This looks so cute you won't want to burn it...but smells so good you won't want to resist! Great for Fall and Holiday decor! This is great for any season.

Ships with insurance and delivery confirmation.

Please request your favorite fruits or other food candle ideas!

These are a great decoration for the table or plate. Incredibly realistic so please do warn your guests and children these are not to be eaten!

name: Custom Wedding Party Gift Suite (Customize to Suit)
description:
This set of candles, each packaged to give as-is is a perfect set to give to all those folks who participate in your wedding, whether it is groomsmen, bridesmaids, ushers, readers or anyone else who has helped make your special day special! Contact me if you want a custom set to cover all those associated with your wedding!

4 Gift Sets each with 5 Soy Travel Candles Fragrances = your choice!
4 x 32.00

4 Round 6" Pillar Candles - One each of four of the above fragrances
PLEASE SPECIFY COLORS FOR EACH
4 x 24.00

TOTAL BEFORE SHIPPING: $224

Contact me to get your listing with custom shipping, or expect to make a second payment if you purchase this listing that does not include shipping (price varies per location).

name: Wedding Day Survival Kit For The Bride
description:
This is a bride's life-saver. This kit helps every bride avoid the many possible disasters that can happen on her wedding day!

Comes in a white canister with a pretty label and stocked with a deluxe array of rescue tools including:

Bobby pins
Safety Pins
Nail File
Band Aids
Mini Sewing Kit
Serenity Travel Candle
Match Book
Wine Bottle Opener
Fashion tape
Antibacterial Wipes
Purse Mirror
Tissues
Handmade Fabric Money Holder
Mini Tooth Brush
Face blot tissues
Travel Tylenol Packet
Panty Liner
Stain Remover Cloth

There will be plenty of room in your bride's kit to add items specific to her such as a little note from her mom or best friend with some words of encouragement.

name: Birch Bark and Beeswax Pillar Candle
description:
This is real birch bark filled with beeswax to make an unusual pillar candle and tribute to nature. Size is approximately 5" x 5" but may slightly vary depending on bark diameter. 

I use 100% Certified Organic Beeswax and 100% Cotton Braided Wicking.

This candle will burn clean for 50+ hours if burned for 4+ hours per burn, and kept burning in a room with no drafts, and little movement. Beeswax is a natural wax from the hive of the honeybee, and takes on the smell of the honey and the flowers that the bees visit. It is lovely, and I prefer not to add fragrance.

name: Bamboo Pillar Candle
description:
Beautiful, realistic bamboo candle.

Default color is a range of natural colors similar to the photo.

Default fragrance is Himalayan Bamboo.

Other colors and fragrances are available upon request.

About 4" diameter and just under 7" tall.

name: Set of Eight 9" Hand-dipped Taper Candles
description: Beautiful for the holiday table. Choose all green, all red, or half and half red and green dipped. Main portion of the candle is white or ivory. Please select all color options from the pull-down menu.

options.name: Ivory with Half Green, Half Red
White with Half Green, Half Red

name: One Dozen Holiday Travel Candles
description:
One dozen Soy Travel Candles, perfect for gift-giving in the office, for last-minute party invites, teachers, wait staff or just a great stocking stuffer for everyone on you list!

Default design is red package with green bow. Specify another color selection at checkout, choices pictured in this listing.

PLACE ORDER BY DECEMBER 10th to ensure holiday delivery. Contact me if you need confirmation on a specific deadline!

Select fragrance from pull-down menu. If you would like a different fragrance, please contact me for a custom listing.

Custom quantities available. Contact info@mdesignboutique.com for info.

Wax is soy, which is a milky creamy clean-burning wax that burns 30% longer than paraffin.

Wicks are 100% Cotton, Lead-free.

name: Cinnamon Stick Pillar Candle
description:
Scented or Unscented, select from the pull-down menu for Seasonal fragrance choices or Unscented.

This beautiful pillar candle would look amazing in a center-piece or to stand alone. Wax will burn out toward the Cinnamon sticks, but should burn evenly down, leaving the outer shell of wax and cinnamon sticks. Do not burn unattended, and burn for several hours each time you light this candle for best results.

name: Good Fortune Bayberry Tea Candle Set
description:
Looking for an enchanting holiday tradition? Try this!

Set of 6 Bayberry Good Fortune Candles! 

Light one on Christmas and let it burn out naturally. Bring good fortune for the coming year! 

This is a historical tradition! Candles have lit up the dark winter months for as long as they've existed! Start this tradition at your house this year! 

One for each family member, child, grandchild...or one for the whole family...for 6 years in one package! 

Bayberry wax is the original luxury candle wax, as it was the first type of candle that didn't smell terrible! A couple hundred years ago, it was widely used, especially in the Eastern United States. 

The wax is collected from the waxy residue on the leaves of a bayberry bush/tree. The leaves are boiled and the wax floats to the surface of the water, where it is skimmed off and made into candles. 

It has become a very very rare commodity and you'll note that it is a pricey but beautiful type of candle full of history and tradition. Why not make it part of your holiday tradition!

name: Christmas or New Year Good Fortune Bayberry Candle and Branch Candle Holder Set
description:
This beautiful gift set comes with two  (or you may select more) bayberry wax tea lights and one tea light holder, made from the branch of a cherry tree. So very early American and such a great tradition to start with your family!

Read more here about this holiday tradition! http://mdesignboutique.wordpress.com/2012/08/18/the-tradition-of-bayberry-candles/

Use the pull-down menu* to add more tea lights to your set, and be sure to read below all about this beautiful holiday tradition.

*please write info@mdesignboutique.com to request custom number of tea lights if the quantity you'd like with your set is not in the pull-down list.

Light one on Christmas Day OR New Year's Eve and let it burn out naturally. Bring good fortune for the coming year!

This is a historical tradition! Candles have lit up the dark winter months for as long as they've existed! Start this tradition at your house this year!

One for each family member, child, grandchild...or one for the whole family...be sure to request a custom quantity to fit your needs, or select from the pull-down menu.

Bayberry wax is the original luxury candle wax, as it was the first type of candle that didn't smell terrible! A couple hundred years ago, it was widely used, especially in the Eastern United States.

The wax is collected from the waxy residue on the leaves of a bayberry bush/tree. The leaves are boiled and the wax floats to the surface of the water, where it is skimmed off and made into candles.

It has become a very very rare commodity and you'll note that it is a pricey but beautiful type of candle full of history and tradition. Why not make it part of your holiday tradition!

name: Rustic Bayberry Hand-dipped Taper Candles
description:
Use the pull-down menu to select the height of your gorgeous, rustic Bayberry Wax Taper Candles.

These are hand-dipped one pair at a time onto braided 100% cotton wicking.

Listing is for one connected pair. Wax is 100% pure bayberry wax, in its natural fragrance, which is derived from bayberry leaves. This is a slightly earthy fragrance somewhat similar to the fragrance of pure beeswax.

Bayberry Wax was popularized by the settlers of the Eastern US, as at that time it was the most plentiful source of wax. The natural color of the wax is a lovely evergreen shade.

name: Bayberry Octagon Votive Candle
description: Beautiful Bayberry Votive in its natural color and fragrance.

name: Set of Twelve Votive Candles Any Color/Fragrance
description:
Twelve Votive Candles.

Request color and fragrance at checkout. Please contact me if you are not sure I will have the fragrance you want. I can do *almost* any fragrance, but I do NOT guarantee other brand fragrance matches.

These are paraffin with cotton wicks.

name: What's Baking? Candle Set
description: Three soy travel candles in "baked" fragrances. Tired of holiday baking? Light one of these and take a break! These are great stocking stuffers, hostess gifts and will make your house smell yummy throughout the holiday season!

name: Champagne Flute Candles
description:
These beautiful Glass Champagne Flutes contain hand-poured candles. When the candle is done burning, simply remove any residual wax, wash thoroughly and use the champagne flute for real champagne!

Recommended Fragrances are "Strawberries & Champagne" or "Mimosa" but can be made in any fragrance. Convo for your custom requests.

This listing is for two Champagne Flute Candles.

Perfect for New Years Eve, Valentine's Day, Weddings, Graduations, Engagement Parties and any other occasion where Champagne is served.

Wax is a lightly shaded paraffin with a mottling effect that mimics champagne bubbles. Note that it is translucent and glows when lit (see photo).

Bulk discounts apply for 10 or more. Shipping reduced if you order multiples in a custom listing. Contact me for details, including the number you would like to order.

name: Hand-dipped Taper Candles Set of 8 Candles 12 Inches Tall
description: White candles dipped with either one or two colors. Please specify color/s at checkout.
